issues.description: The UML class diagram in the problem statement defines totalOrders as an int, but the solution implements it as a long, causing a mismatch in the expected type of this attribute and its getter. Students following the UML may declare totalOrders as int and face inconsistencies with the reference implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of totalOrders in the solution implementation to int to match the UML, or update the UML to reflect a long type for consistency.
